```{r}
library(altair)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
vega_data <- import_vega_data()

data <- vega_data$disasters()
data2 <- data %>% filter(Entity != "All natural disasters") 
```

```{r}
alt$Chart(data2)$
  mark_circle(
    opacity=0.8,
    stroke='black',
    strokeWidth=1)$
  encode(
    alt$X('Year:O', axis=alt$Axis(labelAngle=0)),
    alt$Y('Entity:N'),
    alt$Size('Deaths:Q',
        legend=alt$Legend(title='Annual Global Deaths')
    ),
    alt$Color('Entity:N', legend = NULL))$
  properties(
    width=450,
    height=320)
```
